website_summaries.verdict: Ezviz needs to improve the Mini 360 Plus' auto-panning feature before I can widely recommend it.
pros: The $80 Ezviz Mini 360 Plus' two-way audio was particularly clear and you get a lot of features for the price -- 1080p HD live streaming, local and optional cloud storage, IFTTT support and a 340-degree panning angle
cons: Ezviz doesn't offer a free cloud storage option -- either pay or use a microSD card
Its auto-panning feature doesn't follow motion activity particularly well

customer_reviews.title: This camera eork really well.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this camera. We bought it to put in our attice. Thought we heard something. The picture quality is great. The features are nice. Still learning app. Only downfall it wont let me turn off free month trial of icloud video storage. We dont want it and itvwont let me stop the ad popping up. Thats why its getting a 4 star. The picture is of attic in the dark. Great night vision. You can also record and zoom in. I could even dpeak to my husband while hecwad up there.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores E

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: So many issues....if you put it to sleep you might not be able to wake up unless you unplug the camera, it says "to many operations, please wait".....with the 30 day free cloud it worked decent, but when that expired and I paid for the service it only worked half of one day. I've tried to contact ezviz customer service but no response...and of course I can no longer return spend the extra money for a name brand camera
customer_reviews.author: LuckyXIII

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing. The coolest features are the alerts and it tracks movement. When i first received the package, the set up took me a bit to get used to but didnt take too long. It is user friendly but it takes time to get used to using the features and understanding what does what. It is very useful if you have this camera pointed at your front door. I was able to see if the postal services drop off my packages safely instead of tossing it on my front door. The video quailty is great too for the price youre paying its worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cho

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I was excited and waiting on this. I read the reviews. They were 50/50. Figured it had all the features I wanted. This was something for piece of mind while I went out of town to work. Nope did not connect. Trouble shooting failed. I don’t recommend this product. Going to go buy a proven Nest. Should have known better.
customer_reviews.author: david k dosenbach

customer_reviews.title: Run away! Worked for 4 months then stopped recording.
customer_reviews.text: Less than 6 months and it stopes detecting motion / recording. Tried resetting and now it won’t even connect to WFi. Tried calling customer support and the number is disconnected.
customer_reviews.author: EMac

customer_reviews.title: Works through the return period then stops
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the first month and then constantly shows as “device is offline. Please check network”. I check network and everything else is running just fine and these cameras ARE WIRED, so there is no reason for this. I hate to say it but I honestly believe EZVIZ must be shutting down people who do not pay the monthly fee.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for smartphone, but not for PC or for security system
customer_reviews.text: Good quality software and hardware, better than most IP cameras. Easy to setup by following screen instructions. Works good with smartphone. Unfortunately the stated "now be controlled by Alexa" was not true yet. It works with Alexa, but unable to "control" such basic thing as pan and tilt. It works fine with a smartphone, but it has no built-in web server like FOSCAM and there is no native way to download image to a PC.
customer_reviews.author: aJayM

customer_reviews.title: Great Product well thought out very nice app
customer_reviews.text: This is a very impressive camera works with Alexa show nicely it does buffer when planning but still amazing . I really like its auto pan where it move toward movement or lighting changes very cool product. Beautifully packaged great price at 49 however amazon raised the price the next day 20% interesting how that always seems to happen. Color is great and night vision very good I would give it A Must turn off encryption to have Alexa Show display video.
customer_reviews.author: MarkAllisonMc

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great, rotation control ok
customer_reviews.text: App display does time out after 5 minutes, prompting the user to manually click Play button in the app to resume stream. Might be a problem for continuously-monitored environments. Quality is great, rotation control ok. Motion detection works well at night as well. Biggest beef - the camera doesn't "look down" - if mounted high up, you can't tilt it down (just very slightly - please review user manual with FoV specs for your applications before buying).
customer_reviews.author: Alic

customer_reviews.title: It has a play back mode so you never have to worry about missing anything.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best little security system ever!!! I’ve had mines for about 5 years now and it really gets the job done. It’s small and so it can fit anywhere. I got one for my mom and she loves it. She lives alone and I get that reassurance when I could see her. It plays back so if you think you missed anything you can see it. All you have to do is put the date you want to see. You could see clear in the dark. I absolutely love it and highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chay

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive camera for indoor security. Even better with Prime shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of research before purchase but based on buyer reviews I purchased one for the den and installation was easy and straight forward. Was so pleased I bought another for our living room. So far both have worked flawlessly and both normal and IR resolution is good with sharp pictures. Instructions were hard to read as mentioned in my Mini Trooper review. Since these cameras do not require a base station installation went more easily and quickly than the Mini Troopers I purchased. EZVIZ app allows quick access from both my iPad and iPhone!
customer_reviews.author: oldtiger

customer_reviews.title: It's decent. There's one big problem though. I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's decent. There's one big problem though. I record my video to a micro-sd card, rather than using their cloud service. They have a "format" option for the micro-sd, which should delete the videos on it, but it doesn't. So, when the card gets full, I have to take it out of the camera, put it in my computer and delete all the videos manually before putting it back in and re-initializing it. Also, the app doesn't have any method for deleting videos individually from the micro-sd card, and so the only way to selectively delete videos is, again, to put the card in my computer with the adapter and delete the file. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: They truly are as easy to install and use as they claim!
customer_reviews.text: These are just FANTASTIC! Easy EASY set up, check the house from work and when I am away. So easy to use and configure. Got 2 more for Christmas and was THRILLED! great color, NV works great, love the pan and tilt, and is great for speaking with people in the house through my smart phone (talked my son through how to pick up his grandmother off the floor when she fell... helped so much along with being able to watch and correct the process. Use it to check on my dogs too. I have 3, as stated, want just one more as you can have a 4 camera multi-screen view...right on your smart phone. LOVE LOVE LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: A. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera. Not much I can tell you about this little dream except it's easy to use with the app provided by the company.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no support, online or onsite.
customer_reviews.text: No support. When I first set it up it went well, then I started having trouble with it recovering from a sleep state or a reset. When I tried to get help from customer support no one answered or replied and there is very little online written support. Right now I'm sitting 200 miles away from the unit, it's offline and simply would be more use as a doorstop except that it doesn't weigh enough to hold open a door.. Great idea, really poor execution (probably a software issue) and completely lacking in support..
customer_reviews.author: williamtm

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!!
customer_reviews.text: this little camera is amazing! the 1080p is amazing quality. you can zoom in and things are still clear. installation is a breeze. everything is working great on it. can control it from anywhere via the app in case you want to move it. 2-way audio is great! awesome camera for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Nat375

customer_reviews.title: Finally.  A reliable camera!
customer_reviews.text: We had he arlo security camera and was very disappointed. We were recommended to buy the EZVIZ and now we have 3 and we love them! Pros: 1. Very easy to install 2. GREAT PICTURE AND SOUND QUALITY 3. You can talk from your phone 4. Has a great alarm trigger 5. Super sensitive. Any motion will alarm you 6. Pan tilts. It had motion sensors and will follow the object Con: 1. You have to pay for cloud storage 2. Does not work on 5G network and so you have to change your WiFi to lower network
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice solid camera with useful features
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice solid camera with useful features. It looks nice and doesn’t immediately stand out as a camera, which makes it inconspicuous. I managed to get it to work with Echo Spot, but it took a few tries and restarts to get it to work, but it’s been fine since. I also have another EZVIZ camera that works well and I can see both cameras. I’ll probably buy a few more of these, provided these last a while.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cowherd

customer_reviews.title: Give me a break.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is alright, software is terrible. I am constantly getting " software exception " error when I try to access camera from the app. And after micro sd card is full, have to power down camera and bring it back, seems it thinks there is no card installed. Glad I didn't buy more than one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nobling

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good, now useless.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well until we upgraded our home wifi to a mesh wifi system witch broadcasts both 2.4ghz and 5ghz allowing the device to connect to whatever is compatible and best connectivity... Well the mini 360 cannot pick the 2.4ghz of which its compatible from a mesh system.. 2018 and this is an issue.. Dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron V

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this camera
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for a while, except the camera connection shuts off after about 3 minutes so I had to keep reopening it. Once my wifi went out for a day (Frontier) it went back on but Echo could no longer access it. Terrible App and even worse website (no install manual online?or way to remove the previously installed camera?Password wont work on different devices?). Better off with an Amazon made camera. That automatically reconnects after WIFI loss. And you can leave the camera open for constant monitoring.
customer_reviews.author: jazzopie

customer_reviews.title: BEST purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! I was so surprised how great this camera/ security is for the price. It's easy to use. I love how I can log in and look at my apartment. Not only that but can move the camera to see up down left right. It notifies me when there is movement in apt. Just note if u have by a TV and it's on when you leave it will go off every time the TV picture changes. It's also about the size of a navel orange and can be left on a shelf or mounted to the wall. The night vision is very clear as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G.

customer_reviews.title: Changed review due to pending Answer
customer_reviews.text: My audio on my playback will cut in and out... Aka the phone I can hear some audio but there are random times it just cuts out and then its completely mute, but you can clearly tell people are talking. In fact I have another camera from a different company set up and there audio you can hear the entire conversation. Vs. this one just snippets. If you are even lucky. Does anyone know what is going on? I asked it in the Q and A's above, as well hoping someone knows how to fix this. I don't want to spend money not knowing if it will work or not. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are great resolution easy to set up and so far working ...
customer_reviews.text: we have switched over some other cameras to three of these. They are great resolution easy to set up and so far working wonderful to keep an eye on the house when we are away. one is used as a dog cam, and the others are sitting in windows looking outside. They were very easy to install, and so far have not had issues with them dropping connections. My only complaint would be the software - the sensitivity and other motion sensor settings are buried under the enable alarm menu choice to me they should be a top level menu of their own.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B. Mclain

customer_reviews.title: Tilt Function Limited
customer_reviews.text: So, these cameras are cute. Pro - Easy Set Up, Nice Picture. Cons - Flimsy wall mount, tilt function is extremely limited. I really don't like the fact I have to swipe away their commercial for cloud storage before I can use any functions of the camera. I can see no way to get rid of this. This makes me hate these cameras. I wish it was within the timeframe to return them because I would.
customer_reviews.author: Ibelainek3

customer_reviews.title: Cable is to short to be of any use normally ...
customer_reviews.text: Cable is to short to be of any use normally that would not be a problem but this company in it's infinite wisdom uses a oropietery cable with a special and so you can't go out a buy a longer cable . Junk
customer_reviews.author: Duane C

customer_reviews.title: Hard to connect to wifi. Had to call provider ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to connect to wifi. Had to call provider to change setting and I could only connect. Other's wouldn't connect for whatever reason unless hardwired to modem. Our modem is not where I need them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nago

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Dislike: from the shelf view, you are not able to pan down to see the floor. The quality of the picture is also distorted when zooming in. Also, when it goes offline it is not exactly easy to restore. Likes: easy to use, easy to install, easy to navigate. Good picture quality overall. Good temporary storage length. It is more than 24 hours. Easy to screenshot and record footage. Great little camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Catt

customer_reviews.title: great wifi camera
customer_reviews.text: great wifi camera. i'm currently using them outdoors under my soffit. no problems. works to very low temps. the unit isn't waterproof so does need to be well protected from the elements if used outdoors. the 360 view is great, let's me view the total front and the back of the house. the only knock is that it is a pay service to view the cameras remotely online, other than that, it is a great product and i would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never lets my 2 year old out of sight
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. My son has a pretty big playroom and the motion tracking never lets him get out of sight. Really helpful while I work and don't have to keep adjusting the camera view. I've also been pretty impressed with the video quality, better than other "1080p" cameras that I've used. Only gripe I have is that I wish I'd be able to view longer than 5 minutes at a time. Not a big deal though because a quick click and it's up again, I guess it helps make sure I'm actually watching, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Master Yip

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this thing to be awesome... But it wasn't. 1. The motion sensing / following function was very slow and did not activate at all in many instances 2. The network connection would drop often 3. If flat out stopped working and could not be paired. Tried contacting support with no Joy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I really like how easy these cameras are to set up. The app is easy to use. Though I wish turning them on and off were easier to get to instead of having to go into each individual camera to wake and sleep. I get logged out of app almost everyday, kind of annoying. The lag is sometimes a pain, but it eventually catches up. I have an SD card in one, but it’s not easy to access the recordings. Other than that they’re fine cameras and do what I need them to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Love the pan and tilt feature
customer_reviews.text: Love the pan and tilt feature, the app is intuitive to use, love the the ability to store video on an SD card in the camera but you can only access the SD card from the app not from a browser on your computer which can only access recordings from the cloud or live view at least on a Mac and the price is great . This camera gives you many if not all the features of much more expensive units at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We now have 2 of these. I love being able to see what goes on when I am anywhere but home. Also to check things at night without getting up, I am lazy lol It was easy to install, easy to hang, and easy to use the app. My husband has added the app to his phone too and loves to "yell" at the kids through it while he is at work! lol I like how easy it is to move around, record the video footage when wanted, or take a picture of what has been recorded! We are hoping to get another one for the kitchen when we get a chance!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Warman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera...does everything as advertised for the last year. I actually have two of these and no issues at all. Great value when compared to the competition. Camera came back up after a power outage fast and with no dr ama. Router and camera are now on a UPS so they stay up no matter what. Good job Ezviz!
customer_reviews.author: Quiet Scot

customer_reviews.title: Good camera - No Support
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, picture, functionality but if you have any issues after camera is working, upgrades, camera issues, etc.. - NO support for items that do not work as designed. all self help resolutions - OK for the advanced techs, but who wants to spend the time to resolve
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Great product that exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Great product that exceeded my expectations. I have another 8 camera system for our house, but, this mini EZVIZ has a far superior, clear, HD quality, camera that I access from my iphone, and it is as clear as any camera I have had. I'm going to be purchasing another one for other interior rooms of the house. The zoom in and out, pan, tilt, and sound features are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera and does what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera and does what its supposed to do. I have 2 in my house and I plan to get more. App is easy and great. My only complaint is that the motion detection on all their cameras is soooo incredibly sensitive that even a blowing leaf will set it off. They need to make some updates to their cameras sensitivity levels it goes from level 0(off) to level 6(extra sensitive) however there seems to be no difference between settings 1 through 6. However it works amazingly well and the picture is perfection.
customer_reviews.author: WonderWoman

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! Picture quality is really good
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Picture quality is really good, we can get the picture on any device - phone, iPad or laptop. We are using it as a baby monitor, it works well for that. You get video, sound, and motion detection. The app is easy to use. We just put a memory card in it and are able to review history as well. Really good product and we definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: di

customer_reviews.title: Question about option for prolonged video without Alexa shutting down?
customer_reviews.text: Camera resolution is great along with the other features. The only problem I have found is the dropped video after 30 minutes. I had intended on using as a baby monitor through the night. Will this feature change in the future to enable long periods for the video to stay on my Alexa?
customer_reviews.author: michael r white

customer_reviews.title: Apple app crashes when you try to pan the camera, hope they fix it.
customer_reviews.text: Set up easy and fast. I have 3 Mbps DSL and am running 3 cameras. But, the Apple app crash's when you try to Pan the camera. I have re installed all of the apps and tried other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: excellent, good enough for me to monitor indoor activity
customer_reviews.text: Setup: loses a star. Make sure you update the firmware though the app, before setting up Wifi. I tried for ages and it wouldn't work until I updated the camera firmware. The camera was able to link to my NVR so I didn't need the cloud service or the memory card. Image/video quality: excellent, good enough for me to monitor indoor activity. I do have some issues with the 2-way. It doesn't seem.to broadcast that. It might be an internet speed issue ? In no way are these two plans "basic".
customer_reviews.author: Felix L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Much better than the comcast camera's were using and paying monthly for. Very easy to set up. Love the pan tilt option. I can watch two different rooms with one camera now although since this one works so good I'll probably buy another. Easy to check in on the kids and not only see what's going on but hear what's going on and be able to speak to them through the camera. It set up itself to our home wife via the phone app. Easy-peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Ian C

customer_reviews.title: Great balance
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Works well with Alexa and more than adequate software. The alarm and tracking feature is among the best I have seen. Love the design - the mini orb is great. Uses a traditional cylindrical plug via usb, would have preferred a micro usb option to make things more universal. Perhaps the best balance between price and performance - have not come across another PTZ with the same benefits.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mok

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Perfectly fits the needs of our household. The day time camera works great and the night cam is excellent for where we have it angled. I get notifications when someone drives past on the street, which is quite a distance from the camera. The only downside is the camera rotation from the app is laggy and slow.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little portable motion sensor camera. I love that I can log in from anywhere with my phone and watch what is going on at home. You can hear and talk through the app to your family or pets. Easy to use and you can move it around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Rains

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fantastic I live in Indiana and took a Vacation in Florida was able to pull camera up and check the dogs out and talk to them. They would look at the camera and turn there head side ways wondering how we got in the ball this camera is great
customer_reviews.author: Mastercraft

customer_reviews.title: Works half the time
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I bring it up on my phone it says there is a software issue and closes several times before it works.
customer_reviews.author: Beth G.

customer_reviews.title: This Camera is Awesome & a bargain deal
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, I’m able to keep tabs on my animals when ever I leave home, also because of wher I’ve placed it I can see the front & back door of my home, it’s a great security feature, and I love being able to talk to my animals when I’m away from home ..
customer_reviews.author: Honey Pot

customer_reviews.title: Wifi doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Video quality looks pretty good. But, the thing is a nightmare to set the wireless up on. It just refuses to connect to my router. If you are looking for something with wifi capabilities maybe look at another product. That was my main reason for purchasing this camera so I'm probably going to replace it with something else.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. R.

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I really don't like about this camera is I can't stream sound with ...
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I really don't like about this camera is I can't stream sound with it running in the background, like with my old unit, I could respond to a message oropen another app but still hear if my son wakes up. Other then that love it!!
customer_reviews.author: sarah e.

customer_reviews.title: Keep A Keen Eye On Your Home
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough positive things about EZVIZ cameras. Great resolution and excellent night vision. The 360 range is incredible! Perfect for security! Consider this an affordable insurance policy for your home.
customer_reviews.author: Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Huge let down
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product, compared to the other brands I've bought (wyze, yi) this one from the specs looks good. But I could not get the sound wave to connect to the camera. :( So ended up returning item. I was using a At&t fiber connection for wifi, I didn't try direct connected to the Ethernet cord, because I wouldn't be able to set that up where I wanted to put it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with my Verizon router
customer_reviews.text: Camera was not compatible with my Verizon router. I did not get to use this as I could never get it to connect to my network. Had to send it back. Very disappointed that I was not able to use this.
customer_reviews.author: bboson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product especially for the money! It has great clarity, easy to set up, wonderful night vision and swivels 360 degrees so I can watch my living room and outdoors even at night. Ordered a second unit. I was able to capture some very sentimental videos of my dog I recently had to put down that I can now keep forever!
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Most of all, I can check in when I am not home; and I can communicate. I was in Chicago and checked in to say "good morning" to the family. What a way to communicate. You can rotate the camera so you can see another angle. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for the house east to use and fun to watch
customer_reviews.text: use this everyday with home and the dog so much fun to drop in!
customer_reviews.author: WDP

customer_reviews.title: Setup seems a little buggy....
customer_reviews.text: There seems to be a bug in the Android app that prevents my Samsung phones (S8 and S4) from successfully 'pushing' the WIFI settings to the camera. Spent an hour trying to get that to work, then tried my ipod from the car and it installed the app and setup the camera without a problem. After that, the Samsung phones worked OK with the Android app.
customer_reviews.author: JWK

customer_reviews.title: Very smart buy!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about these - great picture, great value, they send me a pic on my phone within a second of detecting motion. I finally found the wireless IP camera I've been looking for after trying many! The mobile app has everything you could want and didn't know to want. Very configurable and easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: BKeen

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for the price. Love that it’s motion activated and it follows you as your moving in the room. The only thing I don’t like are the lights on the front you really have to put this in a place where no can see it even when it’s dark because the infrared lights will give it away. Other then that it’s a great security camera for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera! Only complaint is that it loses signal and it is not within my home, it is a server issue. I have all other items hooked up to wifi and have not maxed the number of items to connect to wifi and it is not working now at all. Am in discussion with manufacturer about this, as I have paid the subscription for the year and need this on a rush basis for elderly mom. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cruz

customer_reviews.title: tech support not helpful.
customer_reviews.text: one trick pony. used at my apartment but when I treid to use at my home, it would not configure. called tech support, they could not figure it out either. I would recommend that you follow the rule "you get what you pay for ..."
customer_reviews.author: Big Somebody

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I wasn’t able to hook up wirelessly. I tried for over an hour with no luck even tried resetting it like the manual said. I ended up just hooking it up with the wire. The camera and sound work amazingly and the night vision is great. Love the privacy mode at night. Was thinking about getting another for my upstairs but not sure because that one would definitely have to be wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Motion detection and tracking leaves a lot to be desired. Even at the lowest sensitivity setting the motion activation triggers every time there is any change in lighting. (Every passing cloud) Motion tracking is more likely to lock onto a shadow on the wall than the person walking by. You're better off with 2 or 3 stationary cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Decent camera for the money. I bought because it works with alexa. Had some difficulty getting it to work. You have to get an fifth for it to work. Last problem I had was you must disable the video encryption.
customer_reviews.author: Ks Photog

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great Little camera, great price. Well packaged, easy to set up. Nice long power cord to set up anyware. Video quality is very impressive in a small well built ball housing. Switches to IR AUTOMATICALLY, The IR has amazing quality, turns the darkness into daylight. Very simple to operate from anyware you may be. Easy to review daily recordings. You can also add 3 more cameras to the operating AP. Fun to operate and easy to use off you apple device. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rojo

customer_reviews.title: Nice cameras with good functional features
customer_reviews.text: Nice cameras with good functional features, but neither I nor technical support could get any of them to work as wireless. Why have a convoluted way of setting them to connect to the wireless network when it could just be as easy as connecting them to the ethernet (wired), running their application and setting up the Wifi connection information, then disconnecting the network cable? Of course I ended up returning them and the other devices I had ordered for this specific camera system.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Khalil

customer_reviews.title: Our camera worked good for a couple weeks and then started acting weird
customer_reviews.text: Our camera worked good for a couple weeks and then started acting weird... i took a 360 pic with it and tried the motion activation setting and after that it wouldn't stop acting like a sprinkler.. kept rotating all the way around as if taking a 360 pic but wasn't doing anything. And when we tried to access it, it wouldn't respond
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Tried for about an hour to get this thing to join my WiFi. I’ve never had any issues with any other device. I reset it multiple times but still no luck. Next steps is to call support. I’m not happy about my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Morris

customer_reviews.title: The ability to rotate it remotely was especially nice.
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly and was a snap to get set up. With the app I was able to keep an eye on my home with my iPhone or iPad on a recent trip to Atlanta. The ability to rotate it remotely was especially nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ignatz Wubbles

customer_reviews.title: Cant configure by wifi
customer_reviews.text: I cant configure the wifi. Its working ok by ethernet. Good camera but imposible to connect with Wifi
customer_reviews.author: Carwilly

customer_reviews.title: Camera's Good, Software not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for just over a year and It worked fine without issue for the first 8 months or so. At some point, I don't know what happened but the software took a tumble. Now, the playback gets its timestamps mixed up and out of order. Also, the camera no longer recognizes my SD card and I'm am being forced to pay for the cloud service, which I will be contacting EZVIZ about. The camera and live feed still works as needed but it is hard to depend on it for much else.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dibbern

customer_reviews.title: Some glitches but generally works Sometimes it doesn't do auto ...
customer_reviews.text: Some glitches but generally works Sometimes it doesn't do auto follow sometimes it doesn't respond well to pan/tilt commands and it doesn't seem to pick up on the movement of my little dog (5 lbs) which is why I bought it in the first place
customer_reviews.author: don chan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Could not get it to link with the home WiFi
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable to watch your pets 🙂
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the garage to watch our three German Shepherds when they come in from the back yard - so enjoyable. Product was referred to us from another happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to keep an eye on my dog who recently started having seizures. It has caught one seizure while I was at work and it alerted me so I could go home and take care of her. Did exactly what I needed it to do. I don’t like that you have to have a subscription for it though
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Numerous WiFi connect problems
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, but I often have problems getting it to stay connected to WiFi. Ezviz support is not helpful and has lousy hours. I was last told that the problem was with my Verizon router and that I should call Verizon. I used this camera a lot. Now I'm going to use it as a baseball!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the same experience like most when I had to change our Wi-fi password. Followed the instructions through the app and it would never configure. I couldn't get the camera to ever connect wired as well. Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris G.

customer_reviews.title: The worst security cam I used
customer_reviews.text: Please Don't wast your time and money this is the worst cam I saw ... it doesn't work wireless I have to connect it to router by wire the quality is so so bad ....and look at the verification code it is not complete And there is no technical support to help you ( 0.5 star ) if I can
customer_reviews.author: sherif

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is the worst. I am very tech-savy, and I have had it for a year and it hasn't worked for the majority of the year. Getting help from their customer sevice is worthless. They are of no help. all they do is tell you the same steps listed on their website. I would NOT recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Can relocate easily to other rooms.
customer_reviews.text: Bought in order to keep our "eyes" of the two new kitties. Actually bought the first one at the local BJs Wholesale, liked so much that purchased a second one on AmazonSmile. Nice feature is that you can relocate easily to other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: James Leggiere

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered and returned a couple cameras one was twice the price of this one and I like this one much better. I am very happy it is exactly like its described in the description. Very easy to set up I had no issues what so ever and I love all the options and cloud storage. I would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Tara W

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, app and use.
customer_reviews.text: This is simply incredible. The setup and app was easy and quick. Can’t believe how well it works, tracking is amazing. Recommended to many of my clients who ALL thanked me. My sd card holds months of clear video
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Andre

customer_reviews.title: Light or Dark, You can see
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! Wirh 360 views and low light capability, I can see whatever I want, whenever I want. Huge improvement over the one that came standard via my cable company and at a great price. It works with Alexa or the app on my phone and is incrdible.
customer_reviews.author: Celia GTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!!! Exactly what was needed!! Insanely easy to install/setup!!! LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to set up, easy to use. The instructions booklet was clear. The product home page offered a download of a user's manual. The image is super crisp and clear. It worked immediately with my Android and my PC. I like the built-in two-way speaker so that works through the Android app. Good product. Good buy. Works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Iamjerryben

customer_reviews.title: Also very good quality video but I wouldn't classify it as 1080p ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as user friendly as I thought it would be. In particular you cannot watch your video on a PC until there website cloud update is finished. Also very good quality video but I wouldn't classify it as 1080p even when filming in HD. Still works for my desired purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not network compatible.
customer_reviews.text: Could not get this to connect to my network. Tha app this uses would not connect to a router with 5G or dual. Don't buy if your network has either of these.
customer_reviews.author: I. Maclean

customer_reviews.title: Good Picture Quality. WiFi Range is Poor.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is good. WiFi range is poor. PTZ motor is weak. If you hang it on a wall it struggles to spin and makes grinding gear sounds. I bought 3 and they all do this.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: THis camera works great. I started out with 1 and now have 5. I ditched my ADT alarm system and crap cameras and got these. I have the Echo Show and love just saying "Alexa, show me the driveway" and the drivway comes on the screen. Plus the motion following is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Ned P.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera overall
customer_reviews.text: I have the motion detector set to its lowest setting (1) and it creates 40-50 alarms all day and all night. Yes, the shadow of a cloud moving on the floor, the sun rising, insects, a falling leaf... Great camera overall, yet the motion tracking part is useless.
customer_reviews.author: FredR

customer_reviews.title: It is one of the best cameras that my company has tested
customer_reviews.text: I've had this unit for over 6 months. It is one of the best cameras that my company has tested. The range is superior as well as the quality of the image.
customer_reviews.author: Anti-Crime

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it is so perfect and so easy to set up. So I ended up buying two more which I'm going to buy one more to make that a total of 4! I highly recommend this product is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Virgil naveda

customer_reviews.title: It is ok for a budget
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this for intense home security. It requires constant connect to the internet 24/7 or the software will fail and need to be reinstall.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect to Wi-Fi and the app very friendly
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera plan on buying more it was very easy to get going connect to Wi-Fi very easy and the app is great.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Read directions
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really awesome. You can talk to somebody through it, you can pan around. It's a great picture also.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: This thing is CRAP.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Its lovely until you need to change wifi networks. Now it won't connect to a network despite numerous attempts in multiple ways. This little bad boy is AMAZING! I do commercial I.T. work, and got this little guy for my home. Not only is it great for security, but it's an excellent Nanny Cam!
customer_reviews.author: Chasity A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent affordable security cameras
customer_reviews.text: Excellent affordable security cameras. The cloud playback and storage fees however maybe a bit costly if you are using many of these.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera. I don't want to go over all ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. I don't want to go over all features because it's there in the specs. The app is easy and great to use. My favorite is reviewing the videos saved on the SD card and the app shows you a time line with motion detected. So you can move to where there is motion without having to look around.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: works well if you can get one that hooks up ...
customer_reviews.text: works well if you can get one that hooks up to your wifi, had two that did and two that would not hook up to wifi at all
customer_reviews.author: ken

product_meta.title: EZVIZ Mini 360 Plus 1080p HD Pan/Tilt/Zoom Home Security Camera - WiFi Surveillance System, Works with Alexa, Motion Tracking, Night Vision, Image Touch Navigation
product_meta.description:
Size:AUTO PAN & TILT| Style:One-PackThe Mini 360 Plus’s panoramic 360° touch navigation makes controlling what you see easier, viewing any point around your room with just a touch.

"Alexa Show me the Living Room"
With the EZVIZ skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Mini 360 Plus using your voice through Alexa and Echo Show.

View
Enjoy HD 1080p resolution, 360 degree coverage, pan and tilt control with digital zoom, a wide-angle 92° lens, and smart motion tracking. 

Placement
With Pan and Tilt control, you have greater flexibility to place the Mini 360 Plus, including a flexible install kit for indoor mounting. It also looks great on any table or book shelf.

Connect and Share
Stay connected when you’re not home. Receive motion alerts on your phone to keep track of what's happening. Take photos and record footage any time you want with the EZVIZ app, while easily saving or sharing on social media from your smartphone.

Storage
(1) Local storage up to 128GB MicroSD card to save video.
(2) 7-day and 30-day cloud storage options, with free 30 day trial. 
(3) Use all of the above for duplicate backups of your video. 

Add-On
Adding as many cameras as you want is easy and visible all in one app, for your home or small business. The Mini 360 Plus runs on EZVIZ's adaptable platform, which adds new features and functionality as they become available with easy one-click updates.

Requirements
High-Speed Internet Connection
Mobile OS: iOS 7.0+ (iPhone, iPad), Android 4.0+
Connectivity: Wi-Fi 2.4 GHz (802.11 b/g/n) or Wired Ethernet 
Please Note: Does not support Wi-Fi 5GHz 

Setup
(1) Download EZVIZ app on iOS 7.0+ (iPhone, iPad), Android 4.0+. 
(2) Have smartphone or tablet on same 2.4GHz network as camera.
(3) Create an account and follow easy and quick setup steps in app. 
*Please ensure to update your device firmware from the EZVIZ APP upon initial setup and check back regularly for future updates.

ALEXA Skills Setup
(1) Select the “Enable Skill” button in the Alexa APP to link your EZVIZ account and discover your device.
(2) Select a suitable name for your camera in the EZVIZ APP.
(3) Discover your camera in the Alexa APP.
*Image Encryption must be turned off from your camera settings in the EZVIZ APP to properly connect with Alexa.

Camera Specifications
Minimum Illumination: 0.02Lux @ F2.2
92° Diagonal Viewing Angle 
Image Sensor: HD 1080p
Panning Angle: 0° to 340°
Tilting Angle: -10° to 80° 
Night Vision: Up to 33ft
4mm Lens

Packaging Contents
1x Mini 360 Plus
1x Base
1x Drill Template
1x Screw Kit
1x Quick Start Guide
1x Power Adapter
1x Power Cable
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (hub required, Alexa device and hub sold separately).

EZVIZ MEETS ALEXA – Our WiFi Cameras can now be controlled by Alexa through Echo Show. Simply ask her to show you the baby’s room, the backyard, or anywhere you have an EZVIZ camera. Stay tuned for new skills as our relationship with Alexa grows. The Mini 360 Plus can also be controlled by other smart home IoT devices through IFTTT.

PANORAMIC 360° TOUCH VIEW NAVIGATION - Capture the entire room with responsive one-touch pan and tilt controls and digital zoom. The Unique panoramic touch navigation takes a 360° picture of the room, and allows you to view live video at the angle you want by a simple tap.

SMART MOTION TRACKING AND NIGHT VISION - Track and record any moving objects seen in the room with smart motion sensor. Mini 360 Plus offers up to 33 feet of clear night vision, HD 1080p resolution, and a 92° wide angle lens which makes objects being tracked easily visible, even at night.
MOTION ALERTS AND TWO WAY TALK - See and talk to pets and family with streaming video and two-way audio. Motion alerts instantly pop up on your smartphone when movement is detected.

FREE CLOUD AND LOCAL STORAGE - Access your video content and history anytime. Highly suggest to use 128 GB (131,072MB) microSD card if you are looking to store one month of motion detection recording. EZVIZ also offers a free (optional) 30 day trial to their CloudPlay service, which includes a 7-day cloud recording and 2-minute daily recap.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars803 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
